hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of Ibn 'Umar that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said:Do not take the Qur'an on a journey with you, for I am afraid lost it should fall into the hands of the enemy. Ayyub (one of the narrators in the chain of transmitters) said: The enemy may seize it and may quarrel with you over it
